name: Protocol: Children of War
description:
Form your team with up to 5 friends in Task Force Gaming's® Protocol: Children of War and enjoy the unique variation for military shooters based on real experience of US Army Soldiers who fought in Afghanistan. Heavily influenced by real missions in Afghanistan and the Battle of Mogadishu, you can play against other real players in skirmish tactical modes such as Extraction and Attack/ Defend.


➡ Weapon Customization: 60+ Attachments
➡ Fully customize your player


➡ Protect your head with the HHV ATE Helmet by https://www.hardheadveterans.com/!


➡ Perform Buddy Aid to get your teammates back into the fight!


➡ Eliminate the enemy by securing them!
